value:
$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I can still sense Lady Freyja's power...
We still need to weaken her, or we'll
never be able to use the horn.$k$pAnd when we do...you need to return
to your world, all right? Don't worry
about me, $Nu!$k$pI'm sure there are a lot of people
who've been waiting for you to
wake up.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And what if Freyja is telling the truth?$k$p$WmMPID_ルピナス,ch00_28_Lupine_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Prince Alfonse may be dead...
That could be the reality we
awaken to...$k$pEven knowing that, would you still
wake up, $Nu?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|What's the matter, Sharena?
You look worried.$k$pIt'll be all right! I'm sure Alfonse is
fine. Once you wake up, he'll be
waiting for you!$k$pSo...no need to worry!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|A-are you sure?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|I am. So don't be sad! You have
nothing to worry about.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Peony... My best friend, who I played
with in the flower garden... That was
you, wasn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...Yes.$k$pI don't really remember much
from before I was an álfr, but
I do remember you.$k$pI remember that we were very
good friends, but I still have only
hazy half-memories.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|That girl told me...when we were
trading places with each other,
she was Sharena.$k$pShe told me she drank my share
of the dream nectar.$k$pI felt cheated... I cried over it!
I wanted to drink the nectar!
I wanted to become a hero.$k$pBut now I understand. That girl...
She knew what was about to happen.
She knew there was no coming back.$k$pShe sacrificed herself and drank
my share of the nectar without ever
letting on how she saved me.$k$pIs all that true, Peony?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|...I wanted to help people be happy.$k$pEven as a child, as long as the people
I cared about were happy, that was
all I needed. I was happy too.$k$pIf you were happy, what more could
I ask for? My dream had come true!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But we— You and I played together
and changed places more than
a few times, didn't we?$k$pWe shared our thoughts with one
another...became each other even!$k$pBefore I met you, before any of this,
was I...the original Princess Sharena?$k$pOr were you Sharena, and you
saved me by drinking my nectar
and leaving me with your life?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|What's mine is yours.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|It doesn't matter who was who
originally. And besides, neither
of us can remember...$k$pWhen we played together, we
shared everything. Even our hearts,
and our minds.$k$pYou and I are two halves of a whole.
We each have half the other in us.
That makes us the same!$k$pWhat's done is done. So don't worry!
Just...be happy! That's all I ask.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Peony, I don't know what to say...$k$p$Sbs150|
